block.p: Kerry Sanders looked nothing like Robert Sanders, an escaped convict. His fingerprints, had they been checked, would not have matched the fugitive's. He simply shared a last name and a date of birth, and those were enough to keep him in prison for two years. A report by Benjamin Weiser in The Times Magazine.
Plus: Education Life looks at the deep changes in the nation's Roman Catholic schools at a time when teaching priests and nuns are rarer than students from other faiths.
